thread.title: Savour These 18 Delicious Dishes In Chennai
thread.title_full: Savour These 18 Delicious Dishes In Chennai

title: Savour These 18 Delicious Dishes In Chennai
text: facebook 124 SHARES Chennai, the capital of Tamil Nadu, is a foodie paradise for both vegetarian and non-vegetarian cuisines. So we made a list of 18 such dishes from Chennai’s most reputed restaurants and cafés, that make us drool all the time! Be smart and also check out Dineout's Great Indian Restaurant Festival , India's first ever restaurant festival featuring 1000 restaurants, to figure out all the best, and most delicious deals in Chennai! 1. Paneer Dum Anari, Pakwan Chennai A post shared by Pakwan, For the Love Of Food. (@pakwan._chennai) on Dec 7, 2016 at 10:24am PST 2. Dudhi Halwa, Meena Tai’s A post shared by Meena Tai's (@meenatais) on Dec 4, 2016 at 11:09pm PST 3. Creamy corn and spinach lasagne, New Yorker A post shared by New Yorker Restaurant (@newyorkerchennai) on Nov 18, 2016 at 11:03pm PST 4. Chammp Tajdar, Bindaas Rasoi
